source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as cnt from saleslt.customer
select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema ='SalesLt'
select c.customerid , c.firstname ,a.addressid from saleslt.customer c join saleslt.customeraddress a on c.customerid=a.customerid
select count(*) as cnt from saleslt.product
select count(*) as cnt from saleslt.address
select count(*) as cnt from saleslt.product
select count(*) as TotalCount from saleslt.Customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate > '@{activity('Get Time from HWM').output.firstRow.Prop_0}' and modifieddate <= '@{activity('Get Time from Table').output.firstRow.latestmodified}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as TotalCount from saleslt.product
select count(*) as TotalCount from saleslt.product
